d1_flags: 1. goto C6B492 if TALKED_TO_ANDONUTS_1 is set
1. goto C6B4BB if JEFF_JOINS is set
1. goto C6B516 if TALKED_TO_ANDONUTS_2 is set
1. goto C6B5B4 if POO_JOINS is set
1. goto C6B759 if TEMP_6 is set
1. goto C6B75B if GOT_MELODY_RAINY_CIRCLE is set
2. goto C6B60B if VISITED_SUMMERS is cleared
d1_text:
Npc0615:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG JEFF_JOINS L_C6B4BB]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TALKED_TO_ANDONUTS_1 L_C6B492]
ï¿½Mr. Brickroad, the dungeon maker referred you, right?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½And not only that...  What?[PAUSE 15]  Who?[PAUSE 15]  My son?[PAUSE 20]  Oh... I... can't... I can't believe it...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You're [PRINT_NAME JEFF], my son.[PAUSE 15]  It's been maybe 10 years since I last saw you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm so glad you're such a healthy boy.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Uh, those glasses look good on you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½How about a donut?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
 [LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C6B2A3 L_C6B28C]
; $C6B28C
L_C6B28C:
ï¿½Ah... fine,[PAUSE 15] fine.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[GOTO L_C6B2CA]
; $C6B2A3
L_C6B2A3:
ï¿½Well, I was only offering...  I'd also like a donut right about now.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
; $C6B2CA
L_C6B2CA:
ï¿½Have you already checked out Stonehenge?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
 [LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C6B317 L_C6B300]
; $C6B300
L_C6B300:
ï¿½Well, at least I asked...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[GOTO L_C6B329]
; $C6B317
L_C6B317:
ï¿½Well, at least I asked...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
; $C6B329
L_C6B329:
ï¿½Mmmm... mmhmm okay.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½By the way, why are you here?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Oh, I see.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½That girl named [PRINT_NAME PAULA] must have sensed I was here.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Ok, I'll try to help you out.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm trying to make a Phase Distorter that can connect two points in space and time.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's still incomplete.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll let you use another invention I call the Sky Runner.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's a little bit old but it'll certainly help.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½When you board, always listen for the message that comes from your destination.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You'll get there for sure if you listen to the message.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The round machine over there is the Sky Runner.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½What do you think?  Isn't it neat?[PAUSE 20]  Get in![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
; $C6B492
L_C6B492:
ï¿½Let's get together again in 10 years or so.[HALT][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 623 137]
[SET_FLAG TALKED_TO_ANDONUTS_1]
[END]

ï¿½And not only that...  What?[PAUSE 15]  Who?[PAUSE 15]  My son?[PAUSE 20]  Oh... I... can't... I can't believe it...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
